settings.short_description: Premium Creatine Monohydrate in convenient daily stick packs. One motion. One stick. Optimized performance.

settings.title: PURE MONOHYDRATE
settings.description: Third-party tested creatine with zero fillers

settings.title: READY TO MIX
settings.description: Individual sticks for easy daily use

settings.title: Perfect Dose Every Time
settings.description: No measuring, no guessing. Each stick contains exactly 5g of pure creatine monohydrate.

settings.title: Travel-Ready
settings.description: Compact, lightweight sticks fit in your pocket, gym bag, or carry-on. Never miss a dose.

settings.title: Sealed Freshness
settings.description: Each stick is individually sealed to preserve potency and prevent moisture contamination.

settings.title: No Mess, No Waste
settings.description: Clean, precise dispensing. No spills, no scoops to clean, no powder residue.

settings.question: How much creatine should I take daily?
settings.answer: We recommend one stick (5g) per day mixed with 200-300ml of water. This is the clinically proven dose for optimal cognitive and physical benefits.

settings.question: When is the best time to take creatine?
settings.answer: Creatine can be taken at any time of day. For best results, take it consistently at the same time each day. Many prefer taking it in the morning with breakfast or post-workout.

settings.question: Is MOBY suitable for vegetarians and vegans?
settings.answer: Yes, MOBY Creatine is 100% vegan-friendly. It contains pure creatine monohydrate with no animal-derived ingredients.

settings.question: Do I need a loading phase?
settings.answer: No loading phase is necessary. While some protocols suggest a loading phase, consistent daily intake of 5g will achieve optimal levels within 2-3 weeks.

settings.question: How long until I see results?
settings.answer: Most people notice improved mental clarity within 1-2 weeks, while physical performance benefits typically appear after 2-4 weeks of consistent use.

settings.question: Can I take creatine with other supplements?
settings.answer: Yes, creatine is safe to combine with most other supplements. It works particularly well with protein, caffeine, and B vitamins.

settings.question: What's your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with MOBY, contact us within 30 days for a full refund.

settings.ingredient_description: The most researched and proven form of creatine. Clinically shown to enhance ATP production, support muscle energy, improve cognitive function, and accelerate recovery. Our pharmaceutical-grade creatine monohydrate is micronized for superior absorption and mixability.

settings.heading: Creatine Made Clean, Simple, and Precise

settings.title: Meta-Analysis: Creatine and Strength
settings.description: Comprehensive meta-analysis showing creatine supplementation increases strength by an average of 8% in trained individuals.
settings.conclusion: Creatine supplementation significantly enhances strength and power output across various training protocols.

settings.title: Creatine and Cognitive Performance
settings.description: Double-blind study examining creatine's effects on memory and processing speed in adults.
settings.conclusion: Creatine supplementation shows promising cognitive benefits, particularly for memory and mental processing.

settings.title: Creatine and Muscle Recovery
settings.description: Study examining creatine's role in reducing muscle damage markers and accelerating recovery.
settings.conclusion: Creatine supplementation significantly reduces recovery time and markers of muscle damage.

settings.heading: The Research Behind MOBY
settings.subheading: Creatine monohydrate is one of the most studied supplements in sports nutrition. Here's what the science says.
